# this config file was automatically generated
# using lirc-0.8.0-CVS(mceusb2) on Tue Jan 17 15:14:11 2006
#
# contributed by Kyle at shadowmage.org
#
# brand: Microsoft
# model no. of remote control: Xbox 360 Universal Media Remote
# devices being controlled by this remote: Xbox 360
#
# This probably works for the normal Xbox 360 remote too.
#
# TV button sends no signal and toggles Xbox 360/TV mode. TV mode can be
# signals for any device the remote supports. Volume Up, Volume Down and
# Mute always use the TV mode while the Xbox live guide button always sends
# to the xbox.

begin remote

  name  Microsoft_Xbox360
  bits           16
  flags RC6|CONST_LENGTH
  eps            30
  aeps          100

  header       2676   870
  one           454   429
  zero          454   429
  pre_data_bits   21
  pre_data       0x37FF0
  gap          106291
  min_repeat      1
  toggle_bit_mask 0x8000

  rc6_mask    0x100000000

      begin codes
          OpenClose                0x8BD7
          XboxFancyButton          0x0B9B
          OnOff                    0x8BF3
          Stop                     0x0BE6
          Pause                    0x8BE7
          Rewind                   0x0BEA
          FastForward              0x8BEB
          Prev                     0x0BE4
          Next                     0x8BE5
          Play                     0x0BE9
          Display                  0x8BB0
          Title                    0x0BAE
          DVD_Menu                 0x8BDB
          Back                     0x0BDC
          Info                     0x8BF0
          UpArrow                  0x0BE1
          LeftArrow                0x8BDF
          RightArrow               0x0BDE
          DownArrow                0x8BE0
          OK                       0x0BDD
          Y                        0x8BD9
          X                        0x0B97
          A                        0x8B99
          B                        0x0BDA
          ChUp                     0x8BED
          ChDown                   0x0BEC

          VolDown                  0x0BEE
          VolUp                    0x0BEF
          Mute                     0x0BF1

          Play                     0x8BE9
